name: Hedgehog Farm
description:
Hedgehog Farm is a simple and soothing casual game. In this game, you can reap and collect various types of needles from your hedgehog!

Raise a lovely hedgehog and relax in your daily life!

■How to play

①Decorate hedgehog room
　The germination of different types of needles are affected by the items in the room.
　Let's collect different items!

②Wait for needles to grow up
　Needles take time to grow up.
　If you place hedgehog food in the room, needles grow up faster than usual.

③Reap needles when they have grown up
　Reap needles and get coins!
　Collect coins and purchase different items to decorate your hedgehog room.
